author: bolt
title: Mechverse:Origin NFT based Game
description: Create a Game where the player owns all the pieces like a tabletop game
solution: We leverage Cardano Native Tokens to build a game experience where players use their wallet to engage in the game. We call it MechVerse.
experience:
We are actively developing an NFT Game called MechVerse:Origin.
You can check our team https://whitepaper.mechverse.co/the-team
